id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier (to be written in small letters - for internal usage only).

description.title: Description
description.description: The short description of the project.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day when the project began to be first published (format YYYY-MM-DD).

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier (to be written in small letters - for internal usage only).

name.title: Name
name.description: The official name of the ledger.

description.title: Description
description.description: The short description of the ledger.

forked.title: Is forked
forked.description: Indicator if this asset was forked from another asset.

parent.title: Parent asset
parent.description: Asset from which was this asset forked.

block.title: Block number
block.description: Number of first block which differs from parent.

time.title: Fork timestamp
time.description: Date and time of first block.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day when the assets began to be first activated (format YYYY/MM/DD).

items.title: Network
items.description: A specific network of the ledger.

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier (to be written in small letters - for internal usage only).

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the network (eg. Mainnet, Testnet, Rinkeby).

description.title: Description
description.description: The short description of the network.

proof_type.title: Proof Type
proof_type.description: Proof type of the network (eg. PoW, PoS, Pow+PoS).

algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: Algorithm that runs the network (eg. Sha-256, Cryptonight).

target_block_time.title: Target block time
target_block_time.description: Target block time in seconds (fromat number).

maximum_block_size.title: Maximum block size
maximum_block_size.description: Maximum block size in bytes (format number).

start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: The date of start of network.

type.title: Type
type.desctiption: Type of the tool (explorer, faucet, other).

history.title: History
history.description: History of the project, important events, happenings, facts.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date of the event (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

date_approx.title: Approximate date
date_approx.description: Approximate date of the event, for example '2013' or '2013-01' or '2013-Q1'.

description.title: Description
description.description: The short description of the event.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of the link with event information (format https://).

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Resources where other information about the project could be found.

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier (to be written in small letters - for internal usage only).

name.title: Name
name.description: The official name of the asset.

description.title: Description
description.description: The short description of the asset.

ledger.title: Ledger
ledger.description: Ledger where the asset is being run.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: One to nine characters (to be written in capital letters).

token_standard.title: Token standard
token_standard.description: Standard of the token, for example 'ERC-20'.

decimals.title: Decimals
decimals.description: The number of digits that come after the decimal place when displaying token values on screen (format number).

max_supply.title: Max supply
max_supply.description: Maximum size of coins that will ever exist for a crypto currency (format number).

first_distribution.title: First distribution
first_distribution.description: Amount and type of coins that were released before mining.

title.title: Title
title.description: The kind of the first distribution, eg. Premined / ICO parts / nothing, can be empty.

amount.title: Amount
amount.desctiption: Number of coins in that part (format number).

percent.title: Percent
percent.desctiption: Percent of coins in that part (format number).

ico_properties.title: ICO properties
ico_properties.description: Information regarding to ICO (if there is).

start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: The date when ICO has started (format YYYY/MM/DD).

end_date.title: End date
end_date.description: The date when ICO has ended (format YYYY/MM/DD).

total_cap.title: Total cap
total_cap.description: The total amount of the coins for ICO (format number).

country.title: Country
country.description: Country where the ICO is settled.

denominations.title: Denominations
denominations.description: Units and subunits of the asset amount.

plural.title: Plural
plural.description: The name of the denomination, in plural.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The subunits of the asset (format number).

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the denomination (eg. satoshi / lites / photons / litoshis ...).

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.desctiption: The symbol for the unit of the asset.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day when the assets began to be first activated (format YYYY/MM/DD).

name.title: Name
name.desctiption: Name and the surname of the team member.

photo.title: Photo
photo.description: Photo of the team member (format https://).

file.title: File
file.description: Whitepaper downloaded as a PDF file (in format whitepaper.pdf)

url.title: URL
url.description: URL link to the whitepaper in .pdf format (format https://).
